title: Capstone (Data Analytics)
description: Case Study 1: How Does a Bikes-Share Navigate Speedy Success , Case Study 2: How can a wellness technology company Play It Smart.

title: Simple Notes Application
description: Built a native notes application with an ad block, just 3 MB in size., Features include, URL support, map marker of the current location, and offline NOSQL database Utilized JAVA and Flutter

title: IoT Restro Application
description: Implemented Restaurant Food Data using Cloud-Based RESTful API and designed an optimized UI/UX using Adobe XD , mplemented IoT code using C++ and Arduino microcontrollers for hardware integration.

title: Inventory-stock-Analysis using R
description: Utilizing R and the Apriori algorithm, this project, 'Market Basket Analysis,' discovers shopping patterns, derives association rules, and visualizes insights for retail decision-making using the 'arules' package

title: buzz-chat-app
description: A chat room is a web site and part of an online service that provides a venue for communities of users with a common interest to communicate in real time.
